channel.title: Union County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Union County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-87 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-87 east. Distance to Texline and Dalhart, both of which are in Texas. This is the last distance marker along US-87 east in New Mexico.

item.title: US-87 East Approaching NM-538
item.description: US-87 east approaching NM-538 (West Ave.) in Clayton.

item.title: US-87 East at NM-402
item.description: US-87 east at NM-402 (Spruce St.) in Clayton.

item.title: US-87 West at US-56/US-64/US-412
item.description: US-87 west at US-56/US-64/US-412. Turn right for US-56/US-64/US-412 east to Boise City (Oklahoma); left for US-56/US-412 west to Springer; straight for US-64/US-87 west to Raton.

item.title: US-64/US-56/US-412 West at US-87
item.description: US-64/US-56/US-412 West at US-87. Turn right on US-64/US-87 East to Raton; straight for US-56/US-412 west to Springer; left for US-87 east to Dalhart (Texas).

item.title: US-64/US-87 East at US-56/US-412
item.description: US-64/US-87 East at US-56/US-412 in Clayton. Turn left to continue east on US-64.

item.title: US-64/US-87 East at US-56/US-412
item.description: US-64/US-87 East at US-56/US-412. Turn left to continue east on US-64, which joins US-56/US-412. Continue straight to continue east on US-87.

item.title: NM-456 East at NM-406
item.description: NM-456 east at NM-406 south to Seneca. Continue east on NM-456 for Kenton (Oklahoma).

item.title: NM-456 East at NM-406
item.description: NM-456 east at NM-406 in Union County.

item.title: NM-456 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NM-456 east. Distance to Kenton, and Boise. Both destinations are in Oklahoma.

item.title: NM-456 - Dry Cimarron River
item.description: Crossing the Dry Cimarron River on NM-456 east. The Dry Cimarron River is known as the Cimarron River when it crosses into Oklahoma. When this photo was taken in the spring of 2014, there were puddles in the river.

item.title: NM-456 East at NM-370
item.description: NM-456 east at NM-370 south to Clayton. Continue east on NM-456 for Kenton (Oklahoma).

item.title: NM-456 East Approaching NM-370 South
item.description: NM-456 East approaching NM-370 South in Union County, New Mexico.

item.title: NM-456 East at NM-551 North
item.description: NM-456 east at NM-551 north to Branson (Colorado). Continue east on NM-456 for Kenton (Oklahoma).

item.title: NM-456 East at NM-72
item.description: NM-456 east at NM-72 west to Yankee. Continue east on NM-456 for Branson (Colorado) and Kenton (Oklahoma).

item.title: NM-325 North at NM-456
item.description: NM-325 north at NM-456 east to Branson (Colorado) and Kenton (Oklahoma). Continue north on NM-325 for Des Moines.

item.title: NM-325 North at NM-456
item.description: NM-325 north at NM-456 in Folsom.

item.title: NM-325 North
item.description: NM-325 north in Capulin.

item.title: US-64/US-87 East at NM-325 North
item.description: US-64/US-87 East at NM-325 North to Folsom.

item.title: US-64/US-87 East Approaching NM-325
item.description: US-64/US-87 East approaching NM-325 north to Folsom and Folsom Museum (in Folsom). Turn right for the county road to Farley.

item.title: US-64/US-87 East - Capulin National Monument
item.description: US-64/US-87 east approaching NM-325. Use NM-325 north for Capulin Volcano National Monument.

item.title: US-64/US-87 East Approaching NM-325
item.description: US-64/US-87 East approaching NM-325 in Capulin.

item.title: US-64/US-87 East - Entering Capulin
item.description: Entering Capulin on US-64/US-87 East.

item.title: US-64/US-87 East - Union County Line
item.description: Union County Line on US-64/US-87 East.
